Looking at the example here: https://lean-lang.org/theorem_proving_in_lean4/quantifiers_and_equality.html#calculational-proofs.

Seems to be broken as the variables are not recognised inside of the theorem block. Seems it does work for example blocks though :shrug: https://live.lean-lang.org/#
This is intended behavior, the example given in TPIL seems to be broken though (related: #lean4 > Lean inserts unused variables in an example )
I see, yes it only pulls in variables mentioned in the header (or whatever it is called)
Looks like this (currently) open PR fixes it https://github.com/leanprover/theorem_proving_in_lean4/pull/154
Ben has marked this topic as resolved.
